column4: I'm using jaunty and I've just installed a more recent version of amule (from karmic) and all it's depencies (also from karmic). now nicotine (another P2P program) doesn't run. I'm thinking of upgrading all my system to karmic to try to solve the problem. anyone here recommends otherwise?
anyone here recommends against upgrading to karmic now?
yeah, id hold off its you have a production machine you are thinking about upgrading
ok, thank you for your advice
